Changes: Fix filling the seed desert region behind the last seed of a genome.
Reduce index size for batches <= 512. Add the total bases of index to info.toml for computing the Evalue. Denser seeds.
Change the default partitions of seed data index.
Support suffix matching of seeds. Better seed desert filling for highly-repetitive regions. Denser seeds.
Change the format of seed data index. Use longer contig intervals.
